Name: Beer on-the-rocks
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: I love a good beer and I love Byrrh (also pronounced 'beer') – a marriage made in Bermondsey. Best served as an apéritif cocktail.
History: Created by yours truly on 14th March 2015 at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
